translations.text: Ya'. Sin.<sup foot_note="180624">1</sup>
By the Wise Qur'an,
you are truly among the Messengers,<sup foot_note="180625">1</sup>
on a Straight Way,
(and this Qur'an) is a revelation from the Most Mighty, the Most Compassionate<sup foot_note="180626">1</sup>
so that you may warn a people whose ancestors were not warned before wherefore they are heedless.<sup foot_note="180627">1</sup>
Surely most of them merit the decree of chastisement; so they do not believe.<sup foot_note="180628">1</sup>
We have put fetters around their necks which reach up to their chins so that they are standing with their heads upright,<sup foot_note="180629">1</sup>
and We have put a barrier before them and a barrier behind them, and have covered them up, so they are unable to see.<sup foot_note="180630">1</sup>
It is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them for they shall not believe.<sup foot_note="180631">1</sup>
You can warn only him who follows the Admonition and fears the Merciful Lord without seeing Him. Give such a one good tidings of forgiveness and a generous reward.
We shall surely raise the dead to life and We record what they did and the traces of their deeds that they have left behind.<sup foot_note="180632">1</sup> We have encompassed that in a Clear Book.
Recite to them, as a case in point, the story of the people of the town when the Messengers came to them.<sup foot_note="180633">1</sup>
We sent to them two Messengers and they rejected both of them as liars. Then We strengthened them with a third (Messenger).

They said: “We have been sent to you as Messengers.” The people of the town said: “You are only human beings like ourselves,<sup foot_note="180634">1</sup> and the Merciful Lord has revealed nothing.<sup foot_note="180635">2</sup> You are simply lying.”
The Messengers said: “Our Lord knows that we have indeed been sent to you
and our duty is no more than to clearly convey the Message.”<sup foot_note="180541">1</sup>
The people of the town said: “We believe you are an evil omen for us. If you do not desist, we will stone you or you will receive a grievous chastisement from us.”<sup foot_note="180580">1</sup>

The Messengers replied: “Your evil omen is with you.<sup foot_note="180636">1</sup> (Are you saying this) because you were asked to take heed? The truth is that you are a people who have exceeded all bounds.”<sup foot_note="180637">2</sup>
In the meantime a man came running from the far end of the town, saying: “My people, follow the Messengers;
follow those who do not ask any recompense from you and are rightly-guided.<sup foot_note="180638">1</sup>
Why should I not serve the One Who created me and to Whom all of you shall be sent back?<sup foot_note="180639">1</sup>

What! Shall I take any deities apart from Him whose intercession will not avail me the least were the Merciful One to bring any adversity upon me, nor will they be able to rescue me?<sup foot_note="180640">1</sup>
Surely in that case<sup foot_note="180641">1</sup> I should indeed be in evident error.
I believe in your Lord;<sup foot_note="180642">1</sup> so listen to me.”
(Eventually they killed him and he was told): “Enter Paradise.”<sup foot_note="180643">1</sup> The man exclaimed: “Would that my people knew
for what reason Allah has forgiven me and placed me among the honoured ones.”<sup foot_note="180644">1</sup>
After him, We did not send down any hosts from the heaven; We stood in no need to send down any host.
There was but a single Blast and suddenly they became silent and still.<sup foot_note="180645">1</sup>
Alas for My servants! Never does a Messenger come to them but they mock him.
Have they not seen how many nations before them did We destroy? Thereafter they never came back to them.<sup foot_note="180646">1</sup>
All of them shall (one day) be gathered before Us.
Let the<sup foot_note="180647">1</sup> dead earth be a Sign for them.<sup foot_note="180648">2</sup> We gave it life and produced from it grain whereof they eat.
We made in it gardens of date-palms and vines, and We caused springs to gush forth
that they might eat of its fruits. It was not their hands that made them.<sup foot_note="180649">1</sup> Will they not, then, give thanks?<sup foot_note="180650">2</sup>
Holy is He<sup foot_note="180651">1</sup> Who created all things in pairs, whether it be of what the earth produces, and of themselves, and of what they do not know.<sup foot_note="180652">2</sup>
And the night is another Sign for them. We strip the day from it and they become plunged in darkness.<sup foot_note="180653">1</sup>
The sun is running its course to its appointed place.<sup foot_note="180654">1</sup> That is the ordaining of the All-Mighty, the All-Knowing.
We have appointed stages for the moon till it returns in the shape of a dry old branch of palm-tree.<sup foot_note="180655">1</sup>

Neither does it lie in the sun's power to overtake the moon<sup foot_note="180656">1</sup> nor can the night outstrip the day.<sup foot_note="180657">2</sup> All glide along, each in its own orbit.<sup foot_note="180658">3</sup>
Another Sign for them is that We carried all their offspring in the laden vessel<sup foot_note="180659">1</sup>
and then created for them other vessels like those on which they ride.<sup foot_note="180660">1</sup>
Should We so wish, We can drown them, and there will be none to heed their cries of distress, nor will they be rescued.
It is only Our Mercy (that rescues them) and enables enjoyment of life for a while.<sup foot_note="180661">1</sup>
When it is said to such people: “Guard yourselves against what is ahead of you and what has preceded you<sup foot_note="180662">1</sup> that mercy be shown to you” (they pay scant heed to it).
Never does any Sign of their Lord come to them, but they turn away from it.<sup foot_note="180663">1</sup>

And when it is said to them: “Spend (in the Way of Allah) out of the sustenance that Allah has provided you,” the unbelievers say to the believers: “Shall we feed him whom, Allah would have fed, had He so wished?” Say: “You are in evident error.”<sup foot_note="180664">1</sup>
They<sup foot_note="180665">1</sup> say: “When will this threat (of Resurrection) come to pass? Tell us if indeed you are truthful.”<sup foot_note="180666">2</sup>
The Truth is that they are waiting for nothing but a mighty Blast to seize them the while they are disputing (in their worldly affairs),
and they will not even be able to make a testament, nor to return to their households.<sup foot_note="180667">1</sup>
Then the Trumpet shall be blown and lo! they will come out of their graves and be on the move towards their Lord,<sup foot_note="180668">1</sup>

(nervously) exclaiming. “Alas for us! Who roused us out of our sleeping-place?”<sup foot_note="180669">1</sup> “This is what the Merciful One had promised, and what (His) Messengers had said was true.”<sup foot_note="180670">2</sup>
Then there will simply be one single Blast, and all will have gathered before Us.
Today<sup foot_note="180671">1</sup> no one shall suffer the least injustice, and you shall not be recompensed except according to your deeds.
Indeed, the people of Paradise will be busy enjoying themselves:<sup foot_note="180672">1</sup>
they and their spouses shall be reclining on their couches in shady groves;
therein there will be all kinds of fruits to eat, and they shall have all that they desire.
“Peace” shall be the word conveyed to them from their Merciful Lord.
“Criminals, separate yourselves from others today!<sup foot_note="180673">1</sup>
Children of Adam, did I not command you not to serve Satan � he is to you an open enemy
and serve Me alone: this is the Straight Way?<sup foot_note="180674">1</sup>
Still, he misguided a whole throng of you. Did you have no sense?<sup foot_note="180675">1</sup>
Now this is the Hell of which you were warned.
Burn in it on account of your disbelieving.
Today We shall put a seal on their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us and their feet shall bear witness to what they had been doing.<sup foot_note="180676">1</sup>
If We so willed, We would have put out their eyes, then they would rush to see the Way, but how would they be able to see?
If We so willed, We would have transformed them where they were so that they would not go forward or backward.<sup foot_note="180677">1</sup>
Whomsoever We grant a long life, We reverse him in his constitution.<sup foot_note="180678">1</sup> Do they still not understand?
We did not teach him (to wit, the Messenger) poetry and it does not behove him.<sup foot_note="180679">1</sup> This is none but an Admonition, and a Clear Book
that he may warn him who is alive<sup foot_note="180680">1</sup> and establish an argument against those that deny the Truth.
Do they not see Our handiwork:<sup foot_note="180681">1</sup> We created for them cattle which they own?
We have subjected the cattle to them so that some of them they ride and eat the flesh of others.
They derive a variety of benefits and drinks from them. Will they, then, not give thanks?<sup foot_note="180682">1</sup>
They set up deities apart from Allah, hoping that they will receive help from them.
Those deities can render them no help. Yet these devotees act as though they were an army in waiting for them.<sup foot_note="180683">1</sup>
Let not their words grieve you. Surely We know all things about them, what they conceal and what they reveal.<sup foot_note="180684">1</sup>
Does<sup foot_note="180685">1</sup> man not see that We created him of a sperm drop, and lo! he is flagrantly contentious?<sup foot_note="180686">2</sup>
He strikes for Us<sup foot_note="180687">1</sup> a similitude and forgot his own creation.<sup foot_note="180688">2</sup> He says: “Who will quicken the bones when they have decayed?”
Say: “He Who first brought them into being will quicken them; He knows well about every kind of creation;
He Who created from a green tree a fire for you, a fire to light your stoves with.”<sup foot_note="180689">1</sup>
Has He Who created the heavens and the earth no power to create the likes of them? Yes, indeed, He is the Superb Creator.
Whenever He wills a thing, He just commands it “Be” and it is.
Holy is He Who has full control over everything, and to Him you shall all be recalled.
